titles: A discourse shewing, that the spirit of parliaments, with a council in the intervals, is not to be trusted for a settlement: lest it introduce monarchy, and persecution for conscience. By James Harrington.
author: Harrington, James, 1611-1677.
publisher: printed by J.C. for Henry Fletcher, at the three gilt Cups neer the west-end of Pauls,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
